title: The Pale Elf
tags: how to unlock the pale elf
content:
hall that will read Dais.

Approach it and your party will observe a platform. After the short scene, you can go ahead and Descend into the depths of the palace when you are ready. This will lead you down to Cazador's Dungeon.

Cazador's Dungeon

We used an elevator to descend into a secret dungeon under Cazador's Palace. We have yet to find what's hidden down here.

Some interactive points in the dungeon:

In Cazador's dungeon, you can find the skull of his master, the ancient vampire Velioth.
